title: Optimal Portfolio Choice with Cross-Impact Propagators
abstract: arXiv:2403.10273v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: We consider a class of optimal portfolio choice problems in continuous time where the agent's transactions create both transient cross-impact driven by a matrix-valued Volterra propagator, as well as temporary price impact. We formulate this problem as the maximization of a revenue-risk functional, where the agent also exploits available information on a progressively measurable price predicting signal. We solve the maximization problem explicitly in terms of operator resolvents, by reducing the corresponding first order condition to a coupled system of stochastic Fredholm equations of the second kind and deriving its solution. We then give sufficient conditions on the matrix-valued propagator so that the model does not permit price manipulation. translated_title: 具有交互影响传播器的最优投资组合选择
translated_abstract: 我们考虑了一类在连续时间内的最优投资组合选择问题，其中代理人的交易既产生由矩阵值Volterra传播器驱动的瞬时交叉影响，又产生临时价格影响。我们将这个问题阐述为收入风险函数的最大化，代理人还利用逐步可测的价格预测信号上的可用信息。我们通过将相应的一阶条件约化为第二类随机Fredholm方程的耦合系统，并推导其解，明确解决了最大化问题。然后我们对矩阵值传播器给出了模型不允许价格操纵的充分条件。我们还提供了最优投资组合问题和相关最优执行问题解的实现。我们的解提供了关于影响的金融见解。
tldr: 该论文研究了具有交互影响传播器的最优投资组合选择问题，并通过运算子残差明确解决了这一问题。
en_tdlr: The paper investigates the optimal portfolio choice problem with cross-impact propagators, explicitly solving it in terms of operator resolvents.
